## TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT

### TENDER INFORMATION
* The bid submission should be made electronically via the [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) platform.
* The tender notice can be viewed and downloaded from the [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website.
* Bidders must carefully review all information before proceeding with the bid submission.

### Contract Details
This tender solicitation is a *Request for Proposal* for the administration, operations, and maintenance of the Îles-de-la-Madeleine Airport. The contract will be established according to the terms and conditions outlined in the *Statement of Work* attached to this document. All bidders are expected to deliver the services as per the contract requirements.

### Overview
This project involves the provision of administration, operations, and maintenance services to the Îles-de-la-Madeleine Airport. Key deliverables will include:

* Administration and day-to-day operations of the airport
* Maintenance of the airport's facilities and infrastructure
* Compliance with all relevant regulatory requirements

### Eligibility Criteria
* [Download the Eligibility Criteria package](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/13/435fbab89e684312b91e3c5d62b4ea1c/t3033-220169_request_for_proposals.pdf) for the complete specifications.

### NOTICE
The tender closing date is 2023-06-06 at 14:00:00. The deadline is firm and any late submissions will not be considered. [Download the bid package](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/05/25/deb01251e6f60263376e1f00d1b82c1c/addenda_ddp_modifiee_5.pdf) for the complete specifications.
